subject: Re: [sugar] Sugar tinderbox.
body:
I think I've got a case of the mondays. sorry.

o


On Mon, 2007-06-04 at 12:18 -0400, Chris Ball wrote:
> Hi Owen,
>    >> 
>    >> Upcoming features include e-mail and RSS notifications, builds
>    >> from machines running different distributions, and activity
>    >> testing after the build finishes -- "does each activity start up
>    >> without crashing" would be a good start.
> 
>    > Would it be possible to attempt to run each of the activities to
>    > see if they successfully start up?  If I can see that the news
>    > reader is failing to launch, I can look into it and see what api
>    > changes there have been.
> 
> Yes, that's what the final paragraph was trying to say.  :)
> 
> - Chris.
